text: John Sessions' Tall Tales was a British comedy written by and starring John Sessions. The show was commissioned as a result of John Sessions' reputation for improvisation, having been a pivotal figure in the success of Whose Line Is It Anyway?, and was intended as 6 half-hour comic plays, to be penned by Sessions, but rooted in improvisation. All 6 episodes of John Sessions' Tall Tales were produced and directed by Geoff Posner for Pozzitive Television. ==References== Category:1991 British television series debuts Category:British comedy television shows
title: John Sessions's Tall Tales
